about_the_game:
In this Lovecraftian rogue-lite, you’ll use your research notes and tools to learn the language of the great beyond. Learn to understand the ancient horror that roams the earth– or kill its offspring, and face the consequences. What matters is that you act fast: if their influence is left unchecked, the world will succumb to chaos and corruption. Your decisions will determine the fate of humanity.

Talk to an Ancient Being

Mere days ago, an otherworldly behemoth pierced the veil of our reality. Looming over your homeland, it corrupts the minds of both the people of your village and the wildlife in the surrounding forests. Only you seem spared from its influence… until feverish nightmares begin to plague you. The entity in a sea of white– It tries to communicate, but the strange symbols it reveals have no meaning to you. To understand why it’s here, you first need to learn its language

Survive and Explore the Wilderness

Your first expedition is bound to fail, as is your second. But with some practice and research, you may just find yourself deeper and deeper within the chaos and corruption. What will you find at the root of it all?

Time-based Combat

Rely on your notes as your sanity wears thin. Being face to face with these horrors takes a toll on you as well.

Game Features:

  • Study the eldritch language: Use your steadily growing research notes to understand the horrors and learn how to communicate with them.
  • Uncover a mystery: Find out who - or what - unleashed these horrors upon our reality.
  • Choose your destiny: Will you save your village, or watch it succumb to madness? Join a cult, or weaponize the monsters? The fate of humanity lies in your hands.
  • Grow stronger: Upgrade your tools, expand your knowledge and steel your mind to travel deeper into the corrupted forest.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and may not be appropriate for viewing at work due to descriptions of violence and fantasy violence.

name: Eldritch Empathy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Learn the language of an eldritch behemoth in the Lovecraftian rogue-lite Eldritch Empathy. Study cosmic horrors to uncover their mysteries or eliminate them and face the repercussions. Your decisions will shape the fate of humanity.
